# function: secrets_config

This function handles the secrets processing domain, taking processed customer/product data as input.



## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
secrets_config(customers_config dynamic, features dynamic, component_secrets dynamic) dynamic
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `customers_config` (Dynamic) Output from customers_config function. Contains: inherit_customer, inherit_product, and inherit_products_subfeatures maps.
1. `features` (Dynamic) Map of feature definitions. Each feature can have: subfeatures (map of bools), required_config_params (list of strings), and involved_secrets (map with fields and depends_on).
1. `component_secrets` (Dynamic) Map of component-specific secrets configuration. Structure: component -> secret -> {fields: []}
